Places are limited, so please book in early.

* [New York](https://rstats.ai/nyr#tidy-time-series-and-forecasting-in-r), 11-12 July 2023. Followed by the [New York R conference](https://rstats.ai/nyr). (Register for the workshop as part of the NYR conference registration.)
* [Chicago](https://posit-conf-2023.github.io/workshops/workshops/forecasting/), 17-18 September 2023. Followed by the [Posit conference](https://posit.co/conference). (Register for the workshop as part of the Posit conference registration.)

The workshop introduces the [tidyverts](https://tidyverts.org) set of packages. Further details about the workshop are [here](https://robjhyndman.com/teaching/#tidy-time-series-forecasting-in-r).
